column1: '''Vivendi''' is a French media conglomerate, owner of [[Sierra Entertainment]] and for a short time also of [[Houghton Mifflin]]. The branch concerned with interactive multimedia, '''Vivendi Games''', published several [[:Category:games
column2: video games]] on the license of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' and ''[[The Hobbit]]'', before the book rights went to [[Electronic Arts]]:

column1: * [[2002]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game)
column2: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]''

column1: * [[2004]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: War of the Ring]]''
